action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and inbox for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enhance patient record search capabilities.
notes: This allows searching by multiple criteria for better precision.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process outlined to update the password.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Complete the two-step validation process to set a new eSignature ID.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate identity before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA standards.
notes: Select and order patient chart sections for standardized documents.
